name: Adventure 3: The Satan Crystals
overview: An adventure game part of a 4-part Black Crystal game series. In this, the third stage of the adventurer's journey, you play the part of the holy questor. You must locate and win all ten of the legendary crystals which, it is said, can repel Satan's evil and purify the world forever. You begin your quest at the holy Temple. A guild of adventurers can be found in the nearby village.
